definitions.definition: to (cause someone or something to) move or fall suddenly and often a long way forward, down, or into something:
examples: We ran down to the beach and plunged into the sea.

definitions.definition: a sudden movement or fall forward, down, or into something:
examples: I really enjoyed my plunge (= jumping in and swimming) in the pool.

definitions.definition: a sudden and large fall in value or level:
examples: We are expecting a plunge in profits this year.
